channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: ok... I am close to having my server and i dont know what is wrong. It lets me login but just goes to black screen and says connection lost. and it will let me on for about 1 second than connection lost again but it lets me in the server (sometimes) here are some pics of what is happening.

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

well ive went through and deleted all of the char files and the same thing happens.

when i log in it lets me talk and it says null.
and i dont click anything and it just keeps going on and on by itself saying that i have disconnected and rejoined but the black screen stays the same and i have tried 4 different sources.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

the first image means that all the compiling is successfull, (DOUCHEBAG), and the second error might mean you have to go in the file “character” and erase your file, or you need to clear out our bank and inventory in your character file, or it could be this gay thing for homos called “silabsoft”.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Path_To_Pain Path To Pain
item.description:
@Path_To_Pain wrote:

The first one just means that the server has been successfully compiled. For the other error i would try deleting your character from the character folder then sign back on to the server

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help

item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

ok… I am close to having my server and i dont know what is wrong. It lets me login but just goes to black screen and says connection lost. and it will let me on for about 1 second than connection lost again but it lets me in the server (sometimes)
here are some pics of what is happening.
